Class BitKeeperRepository

public class BitKeeperRepository extends Repository

    • fileHasAnnotation

      public boolean fileHasAnnotation(File file)
      Returns whether BitKeeper has annotation for a file. It does if it has history for the file.
      Returns:
      ret a boolean denoting whether it does or not

    • annotate

      public Annotation annotate(File file, String revision) throws IOException
      Annotate the specified file/revision. The options -aur to @{code bk annotate} specify that Bitkeeper will output the last user to edit the line, the last revision the line was edited, and then the line itself, each separated by a hard tab.
      Parameters:
      file - file to annotate
      revision - revision to annotate, or null for latest
      Returns:
      annotation file annotation
      Throws:
      IOException

    • buildTagList

      Overrides:
      buildTagList in class Repository
      Parameters:

      cmdType - command timeout type
